Janata Dal (United) responded, accusing Tejashwi of misleading the public regarding the voter list issue.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/my-name-missing-from-draft-voter-list-tejashwi-yadav-questions-ec-asks-how-will-i-contest-polls/articleshow/123058633.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/my-name-missing-from-draft-voter-list-tejashwi-yadav-questions-ec-asks-how-will-i-contest-polls/articleshow/123058633.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 13:19:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>JAI NARAIN PANDEY</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="17930" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123058895,imgsize-17930.cms"/></item><item><title>'Farm laws introduced in 2020': Arun Jaitley's son on Rahul Gandhi's accusations</title><description><![CDATA[Rahul Gandhi alleged that Arun Jaitley threatened him over farm laws, sparking a strong rebuttal from Jaitley's son, Rohan. Rohan Jaitley refuted Gandhi's claim, stating his father passed away before the laws were introduced and emphasized his democratic nature. He also urged Gandhi to be cautious when speaking about deceased figures, referencing a similar incident involving Manohar Parrikar.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/farm-laws-introduced-in-2020-arun-jaitleys-son-reacts-to-rahul-gandhis-accusations-of-his-father/articleshow/123059377.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/farm-laws-introduced-in-2020-arun-jaitleys-son-reacts-to-rahul-gandhis-accusations-of-his-father/articleshow/123059377.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 14:13:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="807781" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123059370,imgsize-807781.cms"/></item><item><title>Rape case: Revanna breaks down in court again; pleads for minimum punishment</title><description><![CDATA[Prajwal Revanna, the former Hassan MP and grandson of HD Deve Gowda, was convicted of rape and other offenses against a 47-year-old domestic worker in a Bengaluru special court. Revanna broke down in court on Saturday following the verdict, which included charges of sexual harassment, voyeurism, and destruction of evidence. The court is scheduled to announce the sentence later today.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/rape-case-former-hassan-mp-prajwal-revanna-breaks-down-in-court-again-pleads-for-minimum-punishment/articleshow/123057885.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/rape-case-former-hassan-mp-prajwal-revanna-breaks-down-in-court-again-pleads-for-minimum-punishment/articleshow/123057885.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 12:25:40 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI CITY DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23572" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123057987,imgsize-23572.cms"/></item><item><title>Solar Eclipse on Aug 2: NASA's update on ‘6 minutes of complete darkness'</title><description><![CDATA[A viral claim suggesting a global blackout on August 2nd due to a solar eclipse is false, clarifies NASA. Astronomical records confirm no such event in 2025. The next significant total solar eclipse is slated for August 2, 2027, impacting parts of Europe, North Africa, and the Middle East.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/solar-eclipse-on-august-2-nasa-update-on-entire-world-going-in-6-minutes-of-complete-darkness/articleshow/123057869.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/solar-eclipse-on-august-2-nasa-update-on-entire-world-going-in-6-minutes-of-complete-darkness/articleshow/123057869.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 12:24:37 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="14844" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123057861,imgsize-14844.cms"/></item><item><title>Rahul says EC 'obliterated & taken over'; claims 15 seats were rigged in LS elections</title><description><![CDATA[Congress leader Rahul Gandhi has launched a scathing attack on the Election Commission, alleging that India's election system is 'dead' and the recent Lok Sabha elections were rigged. Gandhi claims to possess irrefutable proof of electoral malpractice, including manipulated voter data, which he plans to reveal soon.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rahul-vs-ec-rahul-gandhi-says-poll-body-obliterated-and-taken-over-claims-at-least-15-seats-were-rigged-in-lok-sabha-elections/articleshow/123057519.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/rahul-vs-ec-rahul-gandhi-says-poll-body-obliterated-and-taken-over-claims-at-least-15-seats-were-rigged-in-lok-sabha-elections/articleshow/123057519.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 12:36:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="45024" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123057938,imgsize-45024.cms"/></item><item><title>'Bhagwa, Sanatana aur Rashtra ki vijay': Pragya hails Malegaon case verdict</title><description><![CDATA[Pragya Singh Thakur, former BJP MP, declared her acquittal in the 2008 Malegaon blast case as a victory for 'Bhagwa, Sanatana and Rashtra,' accusing Congress of fabricating the lawsuit. The NIA court acquitted all seven accused due to the prosecution's failure to establish the case beyond a reasonable doubt.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bhagwa-sanatana-aur-rashtra-ki-vijay-ex-bjp-mp-pragya-thakur-hails-court-verdict-on-malegaon-blast-case-accuses-congress-of-conspiracy/articleshow/123058089.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/bhagwa-sanatana-aur-rashtra-ki-vijay-ex-bjp-mp-pragya-thakur-hails-court-verdict-on-malegaon-blast-case-accuses-congress-of-conspiracy/articleshow/123058089.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 13:09:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34534" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123058498,imgsize-34534.cms"/></item><item><title>Gujarat teacher kills sons, self over wife’s affair; woman, her lover booked</title><description><![CDATA[Alpesh Solanki, a PE teacher in Surat, tragically ended his life and those of his two sons, driven to despair by his wife Falguni's alleged infidelity with Naresh Rathod. Police arrested Falguni and Rathod for abetment to suicide after Solanki detailed the affair and mental torment in a suicide note, diaries, and video recordings.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/surat/wifes-alleged-affair-led-pe-teacher-to-kill-sons-himself/articleshow/123049999.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/surat/wifes-alleged-affair-led-pe-teacher-to-kill-sons-himself/articleshow/123049999.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 09:03:03 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1370661" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123055243,imgsize-1370661.cms"/></item><item><title>Mark Zuckerberg meets 24-yr-old AI researcher who rejected Meta's $125m job offer</title><description><![CDATA[Meta's aggressive pursuit of AI dominance led them to recruit 24-year-old Matt Deitke, initially offering $125 million, which he declined. Zuckerberg's personal intervention resulted in a revised $250 million package, including potential $100 million in the first year. Deitke, known for his work on Molmo and founding Vercept, is a highly sought-after AI talent.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/mark-zuckerberg-meets-24-year-old-ai-researcher-who-rejected-metas-125-million-job-offer-and-then-/articleshow/123058105.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 12:36:30 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23578" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123058081,imgsize-23578.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: UP cop offers milk and flowers to floodwater entering his home</title><description><![CDATA[A Prayagraj police officer, Chandradeep Nishad, was captured on video worshipping floodwater outside his home, as monsoon rains intensify across northern India. Nishad, seen offering milk and flowers to the water he calls “Mother Ganga,” shared the video on Instagram.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/up-cop-offers-milk-and-flowers-to-floodwater-entering-his-home-calls-it-mother-ganga-and-swims-in-it-viral-video/articleshow/123057827.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/up-cop-offers-milk-and-flowers-to-floodwater-entering-his-home-calls-it-mother-ganga-and-swims-in-it-viral-video/articleshow/123057827.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 13:03:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="4006454" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123058217,imgsize-4006454.cms"/></item><item><title>Couple abandons 10-year-old son in Barcelona airport to catch flight on time</title><description><![CDATA[A couple reportedly left their ten-year-old son at Barcelona airport. The parents discovered his passport had expired. They boarded their flight home without him. A terminal worker shared a video criticizing their actions. Airport staff found the boy alone and alerted the police. The parents were located and taken off the plane for questioning.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/not-normal-couple-abandons-10-year-old-son-in-barcelona-airport-was-getting-late-to-catch-flight/articleshow/123057333.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/not-normal-couple-abandons-10-year-old-son-in-barcelona-airport-was-getting-late-to-catch-flight/articleshow/123057333.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 11:57:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="948346" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123057387,imgsize-948346.cms"/></item><item><title>India still buying oil from Russia: Report rebuts Trump's 'good steps' claim</title><description><![CDATA[Despite Trump's claim that India has ceased oil imports from Russia, government sources confirm that Indian refiners continue to purchase Russian crude, driven by economic factors like price and logistics.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/india-continuing-to-buy-oil-from-russia-report-rebuts-donald-trumps-good-steps-claim-decision-guided-by-national-interest-and-global-energy-stability/articleshow/123055727.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/india-continuing-to-buy-oil-from-russia-report-rebuts-donald-trumps-good-steps-claim-decision-guided-by-national-interest-and-global-energy-stability/articleshow/123055727.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 10:17:45 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="822876" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123055816,imgsize-822876.cms"/></item><item><title>How China's DeepSeek made Mark Zuckerberg lose faith in Meta's AI team</title><description><![CDATA[Mark Zuckerberg is under pressure to justify Meta's massive AI investments as the company's profit growth slows. ': Trump praises Karoline Leavitt - Watch video</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump praised Karoline Leavitt, hinting at potential pardons for Ghislaine Maxwell and Sean Combs, while advocating severe consequences for Obama and Clinton over the 2016 election interference. He addressed Medvedev's nuclear remarks, confirmed US nuclear subs' proximity to Russia, and expressed reluctance to remove Jerome Powell as Fed chair despite criticism.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/her-lips-move-like-trump-praises-white-house-press-secretary-karoline-leavitt-watch-video/articleshow/123055807.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/her-lips-move-like-trump-praises-white-house-press-secretary-karoline-leavitt-watch-video/articleshow/123055807.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 12:43:54 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23438" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123057483,imgsize-23438.cms"/></item><item><title>Trade talks: Govt hardens stand on no-go areas</title><description><![CDATA[Amidst new US levies on Indian exports, the government твердо stands firm on protecting its farmers' interests, especially regarding farm, dairy, and genetically modified products. This initiative occurs amidst rising global criticism of the humanitarian crisis and accusations against Israel. Lt. Gen. Eyal Zamir refuted claims of starvation, blaming Hamas for the suffering and stating military operations will persist regardless of hostage negotiations.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/126-packages-six-countries-israel-airdrops-aid-in-gaza-dismisses-starving-palestinians-claims/articleshow/123056956.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/126-packages-six-countries-israel-airdrops-aid-in-gaza-dismisses-starving-palestinians-claims/articleshow/123056956.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 11:51:58 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="76378" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123057500,imgsize-76378.cms"/></item><item><title>Infra boost in Varanasi: PM Modi flags off Rs 2,200 crore projects</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/infra-boost-in-varanasi-pm-modi-flags-off-rs-2200-crore-projects-releases-20th-instalment-of-pm-kisan-scheme/articleshow/123056632.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/infra-boost-in-varanasi-pm-modi-flags-off-rs-2200-crore-projects-releases-20th-instalment-of-pm-kisan-scheme/articleshow/123056632.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 11:15:02 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="975792" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123056700,imgsize-975792.cms"/></item><item><title>‘Bumrah needs a proper off-season’: Australia cricket great McGrath</title><description><![CDATA[Glenn McGrath acknowledges Jasprit Bumrah's unique bowling style places extra stress on his body, leading to tough workload management decisions for India. What govt said</title><description><![CDATA[A stampede at New Delhi Railway Station on February 15, resulting in 18 fatalities, was triggered by a passenger's dropped headload, according to Railway Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw. The incident occurred on a foot overbridge, causing a chain reaction of falling passengers. Indian Railways has disbursed ₹2 crore in compensation to victims and families.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/big-headload-falling-from-a-passenger-led-to-new-delhi-railway-station-stampede/articleshow/123054519.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/big-headload-falling-from-a-passenger-led-to-new-delhi-railway-station-stampede/articleshow/123054519.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 07:08:43 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="68560" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054554,imgsize-68560.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Rainfall brings Patna to standstill; waterlogging triggers traffic jams</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-rainfall-brings-patna-to-standstill-waterlogging-triggers-traffic-jams/articleshow/123055392.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-rainfall-brings-patna-to-standstill-waterlogging-triggers-traffic-jams/articleshow/123055392.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 10:30:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="3785512" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123055863,imgsize-3785512.cms"/></item><item><title>Bumrah absent? No worries! Siraj showed once again that India can count on him</title><description><![CDATA[At the Oval, Mohammed Siraj led India's pace attack. This happened in Jasprit Bumrah's absence. Siraj's performance brought India back into the Test. He bowled with passion and experience. His rhythm inspired fellow pacers. Siraj learned from Ben Stokes. He adjusted his length to take crucial wickets. Despite the effort, five-wicket hauls have been infrequent for Siraj.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/jasprit-bumrah-absent-no-worries-mohammed-siraj-showed-once-again-that-india-can-count-on-him/articleshow/123057000.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/jasprit-bumrah-absent-no-worries-mohammed-siraj-showed-once-again-that-india-can-count-on-him/articleshow/123057000.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 11:35:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ARANI BASU</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="123002" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123057055,imgsize-123002.cms"/></item><item><title>'Stay home to avoid rape': Sexist posters by Gujarat traffic police draw public fury</title><description><![CDATA[Ahmedabad traffic police face criticism for sponsoring 'women's safety' posters featuring controversial messages. The posters, warning against late-night parties and isolated areas to avoid rape, sparked outrage for their sexist and fear-mongering tone. Authorities have since removed the posters, admitting they were 'indecent' and claiming they never approved such language.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/stay-home-to-not-get-raped-traffic-cops-sponsored-signs/articleshow/123050782.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/ahmedabad/stay-home-to-not-get-raped-traffic-cops-sponsored-signs/articleshow/123050782.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 02:01:57 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1083971" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054683,imgsize-1083971.cms"/></item><item><title>Man slapped during 'panic attack' on IndiGo flight goes missing</title><description><![CDATA[A young man from Assam went missing after being slapped on an IndiGo flight from Mumbai to Kolkata, sparking outrage. Videos circulating online showed waterlogged rooms and corridors, highlighting the extent of the damage. The downpour also disrupted daily life in Ghaziabad, flooding basements and the GDA office, prompting a weather alert for continued heavy rain.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-ghaziabad-hostel-flooded-as-heavy-rain-swamps-corridors-students-struggle-to-gather-belongings/articleshow/123055546.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/watch-ghaziabad-hostel-flooded-as-heavy-rain-swamps-corridors-students-struggle-to-gather-belongings/articleshow/123055546.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 10:18:44 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="5079403" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123055877,imgsize-5079403.cms"/></item><item><title>'Father was mocked for letting me play football in shorts': Gardener’s daughter makes India U-20</title><description><![CDATA[Khushbu Saroj, daughter of a gardener from Ahmedabad, overcame societal resistance and her father's initial reluctance to earn a spot on India's U-20 Women’s Asian Cup Qualifiers team. Her journey, fueled by her mother and sisters' support and her coach's guidance, transformed her father's doubts into immense pride. Khushbu's story exemplifies perseverance and the realization of an once-impossible dream.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/my-father-was-mocked-by-his-friends-for-letting-me-play-football-in-shorts-gardeners-daughter-makes-indias-u-20-team/articleshow/123056369.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/football/top-stories/my-father-was-mocked-by-his-friends-for-letting-me-play-football-in-shorts-gardeners-daughter-makes-indias-u-20-team/articleshow/123056369.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 10:47:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SABU CHERIAN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="14110" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123056387,imgsize-14110.cms"/></item><item><title>Man cuts off father-in-law’s nose over wife’s illegal remarriage in Jaisalmer</title><description><![CDATA[In a shocking incident in Barmer's Bhaghbare village, Ramesh Kumar Vishnoi allegedly attacked his father-in-law, Mohanlal Vishnoi, severing his nose. The assault stemmed from Ramesh's anger over his wife's illegal remarriage to another man on July 18. Accompanied by his father and others, Ramesh confronted Mohanlal, leading to the violent altercation.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/man-severs-dad-in-laws-nose-over-wifes-illegal-remarriage/articleshow/123051033.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/jaipur/man-severs-dad-in-laws-nose-over-wifes-illegal-remarriage/articleshow/123051033.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 00:40:56 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="186367" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123055611,imgsize-186367.cms"/></item><item><title>Indian-origin becomes airline boss, New Zealand media disables comments</title><description><![CDATA[Following Nikhil Ravishankar's appointment as Air New Zealand's CEO, media outlets in New Zealand disabled social media comments due to a surge of racist remarks targeting his Indian ethnicity. News organizations like New Zealand Herald, Radio New Zealand, and 1News cited their inability to moderate the hateful content as the reason for shutting down comments. ]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/indian-origin-nikhil-ravishankar-becomes-airline-boss-new-zealand-media-disables-comments-on-social-media-for-massive-trolling/articleshow/123046890.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/rest-of-world/indian-origin-nikhil-ravishankar-becomes-airline-boss-new-zealand-media-disables-comments-on-social-media-for-massive-trolling/articleshow/123046890.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 20:55:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="37218" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123046878,imgsize-37218.cms"/></item><item><title>'Told Bumrah, why are you leaving, whom would I hug after fifer?' - Siraj</title><description><![CDATA[Mohammed Siraj's four-wicket haul, along with Prasidh Krishna's, helped India fight back against England on Day 2. India ended the day with a lead of 52, with Yashasvi Jaiswal unbeaten on 51.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-told-jasprit-bumrah-why-are-you-leaving-whom-would-i-hug-after-five-wickets-mohammed-siraj-after-day-2-heroics/articleshow/123055365.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/ind-vs-eng-told-jasprit-bumrah-why-are-you-leaving-whom-would-i-hug-after-five-wickets-mohammed-siraj-after-day-2-heroics/articleshow/123055365.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 10:03:48 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="74380" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123055846,imgsize-74380.cms"/></item><item><title>Ex-NBA star Danilo Gallinari's pregnant wife hospitalized after shark bite on vacation</title><description><![CDATA[Eleonora Boi, wife of basketball player Danilo Gallinari, faced a shark attack while swimming in Puerto Rico. Gallinari, who recently joined Vaqueros de Bayamón, is supporting his wife's recovery after the shocking incident.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/ex-nba-star-danilo-gallinaris-vacation-takes-tragic-turn-after-pregnant-wife-suffered-shark-bite-required-hospitalization/articleshow/123055191.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/ex-nba-star-danilo-gallinaris-vacation-takes-tragic-turn-after-pregnant-wife-suffered-shark-bite-required-hospitalization/articleshow/123055191.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 08:59:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>GLOBAL SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="59278" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123055201,imgsize-59278.cms"/></item><item><title>Trump Jr's chest photo goes viral, he asks American Eagle to call him amid row</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/donald-trump-jrs-chest-photo-goes-viral-he-asks-american-eagle-to-call-him-amid-sydney-sweeney-row-his-girlfriend-reacts/articleshow/123046153.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/donald-trump-jrs-chest-photo-goes-viral-he-asks-american-eagle-to-call-him-amid-sydney-sweeney-row-his-girlfriend-reacts/articleshow/123046153.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 01 Aug 2025 20:01:17 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="20260" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123046194,imgsize-20260.cms"/></item><item><title>Who is backing Palestine? The accused, both 19, were identified using digital evidence and booked under the Railway Act, leading to intensified patrolling in vulnerable areas.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/2-held-for-assaulting-local-train-passengers/articleshow/123046701.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/patna/2-held-for-assaulting-local-train-passengers/articleshow/123046701.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 08:27:35 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34960" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054958,imgsize-34960.cms"/></item><item><title>Prajwal Revanna holds back tears after conviction; no family member present in court</title><description><![CDATA[Prajwal Revanna, once protected by his family's political influence, now confronts isolation as he was convicted in court. Police were alerted after he was discovered unresponsive, while hotel staff indicated he was conscious before being rushed to the hospital.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kochi/actor-kalabhavan-navas-found-dead-in-kerala-hotel-room/articleshow/123054556.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/kochi/actor-kalabhavan-navas-found-dead-in-kerala-hotel-room/articleshow/123054556.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 07:14:18 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="24604" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054574,imgsize-24604.cms"/></item><item><title>'Operation Akhal': One terrorist killed in J&K's Kulgam</title><description><![CDATA[According to officials, a joint team of the Jammu and Kashmir Police, Army and CRPF launched a cordon and search operation in the Akhal forest area of south Kashmir’s Kulgam district on Friday. The day saw 15 wickets fall and India ending with a 52-run lead.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/watch-drama-england-skipper-ollie-pope-refuses-umpires-spin-option-forces-early-stumps-on-day-2-of-final-test/articleshow/123054548.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/india-tour-of-england/watch-drama-england-skipper-ollie-pope-refuses-umpires-spin-option-forces-early-stumps-on-day-2-of-final-test/articleshow/123054548.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 02 Aug 2025 07:24:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SPORTS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="50394" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123054599,imgsize-50394.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <title><![CDATA[SuperK to use ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen presence in small-town India]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/startup/retail-startup-superk-series-b-funding-expansion-small-town-india-19644892.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[SuperK plans to use its ₹100 crore Series B funding to deepen its presence in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, rather than expanding nationwide. “We’re not trying to expand everywhere… the market we’re operating in already has immense depth,” said Neeraj Menta, Co-Founder of SuperK. The value-led retail chain, backed by Binny Bansal and Shubman Gill, will invest in team, tech, and brand-building to scale its small-town retail ecosystem.]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[No interim US-India trade deal yet; Indian exporters brace for 20-25% tariffs as August 1 deadline nears]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/world/india-us-trade-deal-delay-trump-tariffs-impact-exporters-19644819.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian exporters are gearing up for possible US tariffs of 20–25% as the August 1 deadline set by President Trump approaches without an interim trade deal. While the tariff uncertainty has stalled orders, industry leaders say Indian exporters remain competitively placed compared to rivals like Bangladesh and China. Exporters expect the tariffs to impact profit margins more than supply chains, with fresh orders likely once clarity emerges post-deadline. Trade talks are set to resume in August as both countries work toward a broader agreement.]]></description>
      <pubDate><![CDATA[Mon, 28 Jul 2025 23:11:22 +0530]]></pubDate>
      <dc:creator>Swapnil Deshpande</dc:creator>

      <category><![CDATA[Business]]></category>
      <media:content height="675" width="1200" medium="image" url="https://images.cnbctv18.com/uploads/2021/03/IndiaUS_flag.jpg"/>
    </item>

      <title><![CDATA[RBI won the battle against inflation, but the war continues: Sanjay Malhotra]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/economy/rbi-won-the-battle-against-inflation-but-the-war-continues-sanjay-malhotra-19642331.htm]]></link>
